project.name: Medical Summary Assistant
project.description: Electron-based AI assistant that summarizes clinical documents and voice dictations into structured YAML-based reports using a local LLM runtime and LangGraph orchestration.

agents.purpose: Performs Named Entity Recognition and section extraction from medical text using spaCy/scispaCy.
Loads, validates, and manages YAML templates for different summary types.
Coordinates NER, template, and LLM steps via LangGraph nodes for structured summarization.
Defines LangGraph workflow connecting NER, template loading, and summarization into a dynamic graph pipeline.
Provides the main chat interface with PromptKit and a summary sidebar using ShadCN tabs.
